A special preview of '''[[Alpha v1.2.0]]''' was privately given to [https://www.pcgamer.com/minecraft-halloween-update-hands-on/ ''PC Gamer''] and [http://www.indiegames.com/2010/10/handson_with_the_minecraft_hal.html ''IndieGames.com''].<ref>[[wordofnotch:1431121056|Halloween update previews are up]] – The Word of Notch, October 29, 2010</ref> Multiple differences between this preview and the officially-released Alpha v1.2.0 can be seen in the released footage. This is the first and only known preview released in 2010.

== Differences from the full release ==
'''[[File:Minecraft-Halloween-Update-Slip.jpg|96px]] [[The Nether]]'''
* Referred to as ''the Slip''.<ref>{{ytl|NQGlB7EcvHM|Minecraft Halloween Update Slipgate Adventures 1|PCGamer|October 29, 2010}}</ref>

'''[[File:Zombified Piglin JE1.png|32px]] [[Zombie Pigman]]'''
* Has the original blood texture, instead of the slime/decay.<ref>{{ytl|Pc2N0wckNn4|Minecraft Halloween Update - Slipgate Adventures 2.avi|PCGamer|October 29, 2010}}</ref>
* Runs around making [[pig]] noises, and makes [[zombie]] noises when hurt.
* Don't have their arms up like a zombie, and they are not wielding a [[golden sword]] either.

'''[[File:Glowstone JE1.png|32px]] [[Glowstone]]'''
* Drops itself instead of [[glowstone dust]].

'''[[File:Ghast JE1 BE1.gif|32px]] [[Ghast]]'''
* Does not have any sound effects.</onlyinclude>
